workflow_capabilities.name: Document-Database Hybrid System
workflow_capabilities.description: Combines documents, databases, and wikis in one workspace
user_journey: User creates a new page
User can add text, databases, media in blocks
User can link between pages creating knowledge graph
User can create templates for reusable structures
User can share and collaborate in real-time
workflow_capabilities.technical_implementation: Block-based content management with relational database backend
data_flow: User input → Block creation → Database storage
Real-time sync across clients via WebSocket
workflow_capabilities.frontier_implementation_plan: Build modular block system with database integration for Frontier's knowledge management
workflow_capabilities.competitive_advantage: Eliminates need for separate docs/database tools

feature_reverse_engineering.how_it_works: Feature implementation inferred from notion.so content analysis
feature_reverse_engineering.technical_architecture: Standard web application architecture with database backend
feature_reverse_engineering.monetization_model: Core feature for user acquisition and retention
feature_reverse_engineering.frontier_adaptation: Integrate with Frontier's knowledge management and project tracking
implementation_roadmap: Design database schema and API endpoints
Implement basic feature with MVP scope

frontier_implementation_opportunities.opportunity: Implement Document-Database Hybrid System in Frontier
frontier_implementation_opportunities.business_value: Eliminates need for separate docs/database tools

workflow_capabilities.name: Spreadsheet-Database Hybrid
workflow_capabilities.description: Makes databases as easy as spreadsheets with powerful relational features
user_journey: User creates base with tables
User defines fields with types (text, number, attachment, etc.)
User can create views (grid, kanban, calendar, gallery)
User can link records between tables
User can automate workflows with triggers
workflow_capabilities.technical_implementation: Relational database with spreadsheet-like interface and view engine
data_flow: Schema definition → Data entry → View rendering
ui_patterns: Grid view with type-specific cell editors
workflow_capabilities.frontier_implementation_plan: Create flexible data management system for Frontier's business intelligence
workflow_capabilities.competitive_advantage: Non-technical users can build complex databases

frontier_implementation_opportunities.business_value: Non-technical users can build complex databases

workflow_capabilities.name: Community-Centric Communication
workflow_capabilities.description: Voice, video, and text communication optimized for communities and gaming
user_journey: User joins servers (communities)
User participates in voice/video channels
User sends messages in text channels
User can use bots for moderation and features
User can stream and share screens
workflow_capabilities.technical_implementation: Low-latency voice/video system with text chat and bot ecosystem
workflow_capabilities.frontier_implementation_plan: Add community features and voice communication to Frontier
workflow_capabilities.competitive_advantage: Superior voice quality and community management tools

frontier_implementation_opportunities.business_value: Superior voice quality and community management tools

workflow_capabilities.name: Collaborative Design Platform
workflow_capabilities.description: Real-time collaborative design tool with developer handoff features
user_journey: User creates design files and frames
User designs with vector tools and components
User collaborates in real-time with team
User creates prototypes with interactions
User hands off designs to developers with specs
workflow_capabilities.technical_implementation: Canvas-based vector graphics with real-time operational transforms
data_flow: Design operations → Canvas updates → Real-time sync
workflow_capabilities.frontier_implementation_plan: Build visual design capabilities for Frontier's UI/UX workflow
workflow_capabilities.competitive_advantage: Browser-based with superior collaboration and developer handoff

frontier_implementation_opportunities.opportunity: Implement Collaborative Design Platform in Frontier
frontier_implementation_opportunities.business_value: Browser-based with superior collaboration and developer handoff
